Name: The tram of wishes
About the game: Tram of Wishes is a meditative journey game about a simple tramway driver. He is a sincere humble dreamer who loves his job. Years of experience, love and sensitivity gave him the ability to read passengers' thoughts and desires. Should he interfere or just continue doing his beloved job? You will play the role of a tram driver who carries people along the same route every day and eavesdrops on their desires. Perhaps you should not always act as the rules prescribe and listen to the wishes of passengers, then your life can suddenly change. GAME FEATURES: Bright, hand-drawn watercolor graphics. Heartwarming atmosphere of provincial nostalgia. Non-linear passage of the game. Short game. CONTROL: Right Arrow - Acceleration of the tram. Left Arrow - Brake. [Z] - Opening / closing doors. [SPACE] - Bell.
